poem:
**Impeachment Echoes**

In the shale-red earth of Texas plains,  
echoes of power's grasp—blown dunes of names.  
A desperate deed, a plan unfurled,  
to claim and cleanse a distant world.  
Against a backdrop of voices unmet,  
lines drawn tight, resistance set.  
In Gaza's ghost and House's quake,  
history's ink, decisions break.

The aggressive move came as Democrats stepped up their resistance to the fledgling Trump administration and its barrage of chaotic, power-grabbing new policies". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
